name: floatsub
description: Subtracts one float from another one. Note that this function has no real use, as one can simply use the standard operator (-) instead.

params_body.name: oper2
params_body.description: Second Float (gets subtracted from the first float.)

return_values: The difference of the two given floats.
related_fn:
Floatadd: Adds two floats.
 Floatmul: Multiplies two floats.
 Floatdiv: Divides a float by another.
